Race.SpecificTitle: PW Proposition -- 4.75 Mills Continuation - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of West Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a four and seventy-five hundredths (4.75) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $283,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining, operating, improving and extending library facilities and services in and for the Parish, said millage to represent a thirteen hundredths of a mill (.13) increase over the 4.62 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2017 pursuant to an election held on September 30, 2006?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Dist. -- 6.24 Mills Continuation - SB - 5 Yrs.
Race.FullText:
Shall West Carroll Parish School District of the Parish of West Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a six and twenty-four hundredths (6.24) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $374,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of giving additional support to the public schools in the District, said millage to represent a sixteen hundredths of a mill (.16) increase over the 6.08 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2016 pursuant to an election held on 
October 22, 2011?
